SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.game.selectionphase

Class SelectionPhase<O,I>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.game.selectionphase.SelectionPhase<O,I>
Type Parameters:
O - the type of the options.
I - the type that represents the identity of the players, aka the "choosers".
public class SelectionPhase<O,I> extends Object
Implements a phase of the game in which the players have to make a choice among various options. In the documentation, the players are referred to as "choosers".

This class uses a SelectionPhaseStrategy to decide which options are available (and to what choosers) and also to determine the condition that concludes this selection phase.

Each chooser should:

  1. get a SelectionPhase<O,I>.Selector through getSelectorFor(Object)
  2. either:
    • express a preference by calling SelectionPhase.Selector.expressPreference(Object)
    • drop out by calling SelectionPhase.Selector.dropOut()

If all the (not dropped out) choosers express a valid choice according to the SelectionPhaseStrategy then this selection phase concludes (isConcluded() will be true) and the results of the selection will be available in getResults().

  • Method Details

    • getSelectorFor

      public SelectionPhase<O,I>.Selector getSelectorFor(I who)
      Retrieves a SelectionPhase<O,I>.Selector for the given chooser.
      Parameters:
      who - the identity of a chooser
      Returns:
      a SelectionPhase<O,I>.Selector for the given choosers.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the given identity is not among the choosers that have been provided by the SelectionPhaseStrategy

    • isConcluded

      public boolean isConcluded()
      Return whether this SelectionPhase has concluded or not.

      Once the selection phase has concluded, this condition cannot change. Once the selection phase has concluded, getResults() can be called.

      Returns:
      true iff this SelectionPhase has concluded.

    • getResults

      public Map<I,O> getResults()
      Returns:
      a map representing the selection that every chooser has made
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - iff called before this phase has concluded.
      See Also:
